name: Looking back on 2020
description:
Looking back on 2020 is an art gallery where you get to see each brush stroke happen and watch as the art is created before you. The series of artworks are inspired by the events and emotions throughout my 2020. And each artwork was painted in VR using a custom tool that records every brush stroke, every colour change, every mistake and every changed direction.

The gallery also contains a secret room that will only be unlocked at a specific future date.

PS. setting your clock ahead won't work ... it asks a server if it is time to unlock yet or not.
